ADAlertRule.identifier: Budget Revision Hold Alert for Budget User
ADAlertRule.name: Budget Revision Hold Alert for Budget User
ADAlertRule.filterClause: ((ad_user_id is not null and ad_user_id=@#AD_USER_ID@) or (ad_user_id is null)) and status='NEW' and ((ad_role_id is not null and ad_role_id=@#AD_ROLE_ID@) or (ad_role_id is null))
